allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Vercel build error by forcing dynamic rendering for pages with dynamic routes

Add ''export const dynamic = force-dynamic'' to pages with [brandId] and [jobId] 
dynamic segments. This prevents Next.js from trying to pre-render these pages 
during build time when the dynamic parameter values are not known.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add dynamic rendering to all API routes with dynamic segments

Adds ''export const dynamic = force-dynamic'' to all API routes with [brandId] 
and [jobId] dynamic parameters. This prevents Next.js from attempting to 
pre-render or statically analyze these routes during build, which was causing 
the "Failed to collect page data" error on Vercel.

Routes updated:
- /api/brands/[brandId]/optimize
- /api/brands/[brandId]
- /api/brands/[brandId]/sitemap-sync
- /api/jobs/[jobId]
- /api/jobs/[jobId]/generate
- /api/jobs/[jobId]/progress
- /api/jobs/[jobId]/repurpose/linkedin
- /api/jobs/[jobId]/repurpose/youtube

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
